headline: A Look at United Airlines (UAL) Valuation Following Flight Cancellations Linked to Government Shutdown
summary: United Airlines Holdings (UAL) is in the spotlight after the company confirmed the cancellation of around 510 flights this weekend, following a Federal Aviation Administration directive related to the ongoing U.S. government shutdown. See our latest analysis for United Airlines Holdings. Recent headlines about United’s flight cancellations have certainly grabbed the market’s attention, but over the past year, the company has quietly delivered a solid 7.5% total shareholder return. headline: Archer Aviation Keeps Falling. Is the eVTOL Stock Too Cheap to Ignore?
summary: Archer Aviation (NYSE:ACHR) saw its stock plunge last week following its third-quarter earnings report and the unexpected announcement of acquiring Hawthorne Municipal Airport in Los Angeles for $126 million. The earnings showed a narrower-than-expected loss, but investors focused on the dilution from a share sale to fund the deal and ongoing cash burn concerns. Shares ... Archer Aviation Keeps Falling. Is the eVTOL Stock Too Cheap to Ignore?

headline: Airline stocks slip on continued delays, Beyond Meat stock falls
summary: Josh Lipton recaps three of the top stories on Wall Street as part of Yahoo Finance's Market Minute. Nvidia (NVDA) and CoreWeave (CRWV) are some of the tech stocks in the red during Tuesday's session. Airline stocks, like Delta Air Lines (DAL), United (UAL), and American (AAL), are under pressure as flight delays are expected to continue beyond the government shutdown. Beyond Meat (BYND) stock tumbles after issuing a weak outlook. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

content.title: Airline stocks slip on continued delays, Beyond Meat stock falls

Josh Lipton recaps three of the top stories on Wall Street as part of Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

Airline stocks, like Delta Air Lines (DAL), United (UAL), and American (AAL), are under pressure as flight delays are expected to continue beyond the government shutdown.

Beyond Meat (BYND) stock tumbles after issuing a weak outlook.

Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.
